Features.title: How does Containn help build secure multicloud infrastructure?
Features.content: Containn helps organizations prevent breaches by building secure, compliance readiness multicloud infrastructure for containers and vms.

Benefits.title: Why use Containn's intelligent secure infrastructure building?
Benefits.content: Containn reduces operational costs, optimizes resources, streamline operations and speeds up digital transformation.

Benefits.title: Find intelligent secure multicloud infrastructure building protection
Benefits.content: Unprotected infrastructure (containers / vms) in a multicloud environment create serious security, availability, compliance readiness, best practice and reputation risks. See how Containn's intelligent secure multicloud infrastructure builder delivers protected infrastructure & provides simplified turnkey DevSecOps across complex, scalable, multicloud environments.

Benefits.title: Experience real-time compliance readiness control visibility & reporting
Benefits.content: Tired of scanning and another remediation report explaining how to fix your infrastructure? Save time with one click, Containn's intelligent secure infrastructure builder, that delivers infrastructure securely and compliance readiness built in from the start! Learn instantly how to start automating infrastructure, optimize resources, save time and inmediate costs.

Benefits.title: Easy set up. Build with Containn's intelligent management console, API or command line
Benefits.content: Simple. Easy set up. Frictionless building for developers to deploy secure and compliance readiness containers and vms within minutes.

Intro.title: Containn immediately solves multiple enterprise initiatives
Intro.content: Easy set up. Frictionless. High velocity. Delivered.

Benefits.title: Intelligent secure multicloud infrastructure builder
Benefits.content: Containn's one click, intelligent secure infrastructure building accelerates multicloud delivery at a scalable level. Save your time, let intelligence build.

Benefits.title: Turnkey DevSecOps pipeline VIA Containn
Benefits.content: Containn's one click turnkey DevSecOps pipeline accelerates development, provides consistent, secure, compliance readiness containers and vms across build, dev, test, pre-production and production stages.

Benefits.title: High velocity: secure containers / vms
Benefits.content: Containn's one click intelligent secure multicloud infrastructure builder instantly delivers secure containers and vms within minutes for any cloud provider.

Benefits.title: Compliance readiness real time reporting VIA Containn
Benefits.content: Containn's real time compliance readiness is built in from the start and provides controls management visibility across an enterprise. No scanning, no remediation reports to fix, the actual controls built in instantly every time.

Benefits.content: Containn protects data instantly by building secure, compliance readiness infrastructure remotely on a scalable level.
